name: The Hauntings: Surveillance
description:
"Welcome to the Directive Seven Bravo surveillance team. There's an office that's been experiencing paranormal events. Your task is to scan through various cameras set up throughout the building and document as many activities as possible. Be warned: this assignment is of high importance and If you miss too many activities, or report improper activities, you will be fired."

'The Hauntings: Surveillance' was made by Warka Development as a 48 hour game development challenge live on Twitch. The goal was to recreate the "I'm on observation duty" game as quickly as possible.

  • 5 Strikes and fail
  • Stream safe
  • Does contain jumpscares
  • Simple click controls (Can also use A/D to cycle cameras)

If you enjoyed playing this game be sure to follow over on twitch and make sure to wishlist my main game "The Hauntings" on steam!
